entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You investigated the attempted assassination of Deel Draav, the mayor of Kor Vella. You findings revealed the one of the mayor's former opponents, Hershel Sheridan, was behind the attempt and took his own life after the assassination failed.
entries.journal_entry_description: Investigate the attempted assassination of Deel Draav, the mayor of Kor Vella.
entries.journal_entry_title: CorSec Case Files: The Lucky Mayor
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Major Walden has asked that you travel to Kor Vella and assist Lieutenant Lon Cope with the investigation of an attempted assassination of the mayor of Kor Vella.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Travel to Kor Vella and Speak with Lt. Cope
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Lt. Cope has suggested you start your investigation by speaking with the Mayor of Kor Vella, Deel Draav.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Speak with the Mayor of Kor Vella
entries.task02_item_name: You successfully traced the threatening messages to their source
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Your only lead thus far are some messages the mayor received demanding that he step down from his office or suffer the consequences. Use the mayor's data terminal and attempt to trace those messages to their source.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: All you have for the source of the threatening messages is a location. Go to that location and investigate.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Go to the Source of the Messages
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Search the bunker for the source of the threatening messages.
entries.task05_item_name: The scrap of paper has some writing on it
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: You found a transmitter within the bunker, but it was only relaying the messages. They originated somewhere else. Next to the transmitter, you notice a scrap of paper. Examine it.
entries.task05_journal_entry_title: Examine the Scrap of Paper near the Transmitter
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: The scrap of paper you found has a letterhead with a name, Hershel Sheridan, on it. Hershel Sheridan is the name of the mayor's primary opponent in the last mayoral election. Deel Draav won the election, but not by much. It was an election marred by the very foul tactics used by both sides.
entries.task06_message_box_text: The scrap of paper you found has a letterhead with a name, Hershel Sheridan, on it. Hershel Sheridan is the name of the mayor's primary opponent in the last mayoral election. Deel Draav won the election, but not by much. It was an election marred by the very foul tactics used by both sides.
entries.task07_item_name: You found the corpse of Hershel Sheridan
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: The scrap of paper not only gave you Hershel Sheridan's name, but also his address. Go there and confront him.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Upon examination of Hershel Sheridan's corpse, you note a blaster mark to the forehead, as well as a DL-44 blaster in one of his hands. The other hand holds a small card with nothing on it but a single red circle. It looks very clear that Hershel Sheridan took his own life out of remorse for his attempt to assassinate Deel Draav.
entries.task08_message_box_text: Upon examination of Hershel Sheridan's corpse, you note a blaster mark to the forehead, as well as a DL-44 blaster in one of his hands. The other hand holds a small card with nothing on it but a single red circle. It looks very clear that Hershel Sheridan took his own life. Whether it was out of remorse or to escape punishment for his crime, you may never know.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Report to Lt. Cope and let him know that the case has been closed.
